FieldDescription: This basic employee profile is designed for this website only. No personal information will be shared outside of the department.
Edit Name, Suffix, Nickname, User Address, and Secondary Email.
Change your password at anytime. It is recommended you change your password every three months!
Follow is a list of facilities you are associated with. View a facility's details to add or edit programs, amenities, or attendance.
Choose your facility.
Select the activity type. Choose the closest type if yours is not available (Email additions to andyviren@phila.gov).
Write a descriptive name for your program.
Choose 1-3 of the facilitator types for your program.
Provide a description of your program. You may use rich text formatting to style your content.
Which age groups is your program designed to engage?
How young do people have to be to join this program? If no starting age, Choose "1".
What is the oldest age allowed for people in this program? If no limit, Choose "99".
Please provide the fee and how often you require payment.
What is the fee amount in dollars for this program? (If no fee, enter 0.00 and select Total/Season for Fee Frequency.)
How often is the fee applied?
Which of your facilities amenities will be used by this program?
What is the current status of your program?
When do you start registering participants? Enter today's date if you have already started.
Submit program to be reviewed to publish online. Users will be able to search and express interest in this program.
Upload an image of your amenity.
Choose one of the options for the type of amenity. (If you can't find a type that resembles your amenity, choose the best option.)
Select a name for your amenity.
What is this amenity typically used for?
Please include a detailed description of your amenity. Include descriptions such as equipment or features if available.
Enter the dimensions of this amenity.
What is the max number of people that can use this amenity.

Add program attendance for your ACTIVE programs only. If a program is inactive, you may change it on the edit program screen. If Unique Individual Count is zero, no attendance is required to be entered.
Choose from the selected facility's list of ACTIVE programs.
Please select the Monday of the week for which you are submmiting attendance.
How many people were registered for this program for this week?
How many unique individuals showed up this week? (This should not be larger than the number registered.)
How many spectators attended this week? This should not include staff or volunteers.
Choose your facility.
Select the activity type. Choose the closest type if yours is not available (Email additions to andyviren@phila.gov).
Write a descriptive name for your program.
Choose 1-3 of the facilitator types for your program.
Provide a description of your program. You may use rich text formatting to style your content.
Which age groups is your program designed to engage?
How young do people have to be to join this program? If no starting age, Choose "1".
What is the oldest age allowed for people in this program? If no limit, Choose "99".
Please provide the fee and how often you require payment.
What is the fee amount in dollars for this program? (If no fee, enter 0.00 and select Total/Season for Fee Frequency.)
How often is the fee applied?
Which of your facilities amenities will be used by this program?
What is the current status of your program?
Change the start date for registration for your program.
Is this program currently active? If you select no, it will not appear on the public website or in the Add Program Attendance form.
Submit program to be reviewed to publish online. Users will be able to search and express interest in this program.
Provide a description of your program. You may use rich text formatting to style your content.
Program facilitators are the individuals in the room, on the court, or on the sidelines leading instruction or game play.
Edit the targeted age and gender for this program.
Edit the amount that is being charged to each.
Edit the schedule for this program.
Add a program schedule. Older schedules are saved, this form just adds another one.
